hero.title: Building Excellence in Cape Town
hero.subtitle: With over 14 years of experience, we create seamless, durable, and visually appealing foundations for your interiors and exteriors. From brickwork to waterproofing, we handle all your construction needs.

about.title: Business Overview
about.description: Kanguya builders began as general contractor workers in 2010 in Cape Town, South Africa, undertaking small building projects around Cape Town. From 2010-2018, Kanguya builders were known as Trust Builders. Towards the end of 2018, Kanguya builders moved to Zambia where we undertook several building projects and changed our name to Kanguya Builders around Lusaka until 2021. In 2022, we moved back to Cape Town, South Africa where we fully established ourselves as formidable players in the building industry, undertaking small and medium size projects, performing project management roles, rendering outstanding services, and providing commercial engineering solutions to our clients.
about.visionText: To be respectable building contractors and delivering beyond expectation at all times and contribute to Africa infrastructure development plan and to play a role of jobs creation to the African youth.

philosophyPoints.safety: Ensuring the safety and conducive working environment on site at all times
philosophyPoints.planning: Create detailed schedule and resources plan to meet our clients' project objectives
philosophyPoints.communication: Communicate daily with all project stakeholders
philosophyPoints.supervision: Supervise closely on quality of work done
philosophyPoints.completion: Complete and commission the projects on time

costEstimator.estimateDesc: Our cost estimator provides rough estimates based on:
estimatePoints: Current market rates for materials and labor
costEstimator.importantNote: Important: This is an approximate estimate. Final costs may vary based on specific requirements, site conditions, material selections, and current market rates. Contact us for a detailed quote.
